parkinson_data <- read.csv("dataset/parkinsons.csv", sep = ",", dec = ".", header = TRUE)

parkinson_data %>%

    mdvp.flo = MDVP.Flo.Hz.,
    mdvp.jitter_perc = MDVP.Jitter...,
    mdvp.jitter_abs = MDVP.Jitter.Abs.,
    mdvp_rap = MDVP.RAP,
    mdvp_ppq = MDVP.PPQ,
    jitter_ddp = Jitter.DDP,
    mdvp.shimmer = MDVP.Shimmer,
    mdvp.shimmer = MDVP.Shimmer.dB.,
    mdvp_apq = MDVP.APQ,
    shimmer_apq3 = Shimmer.APQ3,
    shimmer_apq5 = Shimmer.APQ5,
    shimmer_dda = Shimmer.DDA,
    nhr = NHR,
    hnr = HNR,
    rpde = RPDE,
    dfa = DFA,
    d2 = D2,
    ppe = PPE
  )

head(parkinson_data)
